message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $15000.  It's a fair price, considering its worth to me. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is important to you, but I am only able to offer $14000 for it. I hope this is within your acceptable range.

Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I'm open to negotiating, $14000 is a bit below what I'm looking for. I'm willing to come down to $14500.  This would be a fair compromise, and I believe it still offers a good value for you.  Let me know if this works for you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $14200 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.
